Text: @Mattay90, If you are using Mac then it's a miracle you were even able to create your comment (Just Kidding)!!! All you have to do is click on "create new torrent" on your torrent page and the rest is self-explanatory. You can always use help/about, search Google or go to your torrent clients home page. Yeah, I hate reading directions too but in this case only a moron will need them:) Good luck!!  ..................................................................and THANKS eztv!!
